channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Windows 10 1607, 1703, and Windows Server 2016
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Windows 10 1607, 1703, and Windows Server 2016

item.title: CVE-2017-8574|2024-09-17T00:21:33.364Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20windows%2010%201607%2C%201703%2C%20and%20windows%20server%202016
item.description: Graphics in Microsoft Windows 10 1607, 1703, and Windows Server 2016 allows an elevation of privilege vulnerability when it fails to properly handle objects in memory, aka "Microsoft Graphics Component Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability". This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2017-8573 and CVE-2017-8556.
